 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָתַח‎</span>] **verb** ==spread out== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְתַח‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be long***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***long*** (probably load-word); compare perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***matâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***direct*** the eyes toward); — only **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְתָּחֵם‎</span> [[Isa.40.22|Isa 40:22]] ***and he*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***hath spread them*** (the heavens) ***out*** as a tent to dwell in.
